Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier shortage of available staff. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with delays due to to a shortage of available staff; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
